alert.note: Alert for Central Somerset (Maine) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued February 24 at 10:55PM EST until February 26 at 1:00AM EST by NWS Gray/Portland
info.description: ...SNOWSTORM ARRIVES TONIGHT, LASTS THROUGH FRIDAY... .Low pressure will track out of the Ohio Valley tonight and cross southern New England on Friday bringing periods of moderate to heavy snowfall to portions of New Hampshire and southwestern Maine. The heaviest snowfall is expected to fall from Friday morning through the early evening hours. Significant travel impacts are expected. ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 5 AM FRIDAY TO 1 AM EST SATURDAY... * WHAT...Snow expected. Total snow accumulations between 4 and 6 inches. * WHERE...Central Somerset County. * WHEN...From 5 AM Friday to 1 AM EST Saturday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult due to low visibility and snow covered roads. The hazardous conditions could impact the Friday morning and evening commutes.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions can be obtained by going to newengland511.org
